title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 4318 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
September 13, 2018
On Thursday, September 13, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 4318, the “Miscellaneous Tariff Bill Act of 2018,” which provides for duty suspensions and reductions for specified chemicals and other items through December 31, 2020.
